name: Love, Death, and Banana Cream Pies
name_original: Love, Death, and Banana Cream Pies
description:
Life's all fun and games when you're an undying murder clown. After all, you can't spell "laughter" without "slaughter!" But when you meet a mysterious, inhuman man one night after a killing spree, everything changes...

Created for the Love+ game jam.

Content Warnings: This story is essentially an R-rated horror-comedy coupled with a G-rated romance, made in Ink. As such, there are multiple written descriptions of violence but no graphics, and no sexual content whatsoever.

Features:

  • Kill people
  • Make jokes
  • Battle the Final Girl
  • Flirt with an ancient, unknowable evil

Stats:

  • 7500 words
  • 4 distinct clown personalities
  • 3 murder sprees

Credits:

Story by Ghost Clown

Cover photograpy by Geraud pfeiffer from Pexels
